trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expone los tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> a la automatización de la interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona la inicialización de los valores de clase base cuando lo invoca el constructor de una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento de datos asociado a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for a data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, crea una instancia nueva del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> para un elemento de datos de la colección de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> de este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> created.
trans-unit.target: El nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> creado.

trans-unit.source: The item to get an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for.
trans-unit.target: Elemento para el que se va a obtener <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> para el objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> para el objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de elementos secundarios del control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> asociado a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> llama a este método.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Colección de elementos secundarios.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de enumeración.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el patrón de control para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> should return <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objects for child items that are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> debe devolver objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para los elementos secundarios no virtualizados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> should return <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objects for child items that are not virtualized; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> should return <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> objects all child items.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> debe devolver objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para los elementos secundarios que no están virtualizados; <see langword="false" /> si <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> debe devolver objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> de todos los elementos secundarios.

trans-unit.source: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
trans-unit.target: Elemento del contenedor después del cual se inicia la búsqueda.

trans-unit.source: The property that contains the value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad que contiene el valor que se va a recuperar.

trans-unit.source: The value to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Valor que se va a recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un elemento por el valor de propiedad especificado.

trans-unit.source: The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if no items match.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el primer elemento que coincide con el criterio de búsqueda; si no se encuentran coincidencias, devuelve <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider>.
